reviewText: Caparulo is hilarious - part of the new Blue Collar crew - he has some great bits and is very entertaining. I have seen him live and this DVD really captures the majority of the best part of his acts. Definitely has replay value.
Title: Meet Cap

reviewText: I think John Caparulo is hilarious and this is a great DVD of his. His act will keep you laughing over and over. Though I feel I should mention some people may end up offended by some of what he says. He's definitely not the most extreme comedian I've ever heard, but he does quite a bit of swearing. This is a must see if you are a stand-up fan. My favorite part of this whole act though, is the road rage section. Once you watch it you will know what I mean (especially if you have road rage).
Title: Meet Cap

reviewText: Caparulo is one of the funniest young men to come along.  Not for feint of heart in the language department.
Title: Meet Cap

reviewText: I laughed alot at his show. I decided to buy his CD/DVDs. I was not disappointed. He is a very funny guy.

Title: Meet Cap

reviewText: Very funny dvd. I purchased as a birthday gift for my husband. We all enjoy. :) !!! !!! !!! !!!
Title: Meet Cap

reviewText: I love Cap but hate his bad language. Anyone as funny as he is and with such great material does not need to use four letter words. I would like it a lot better  ihe did not use them.
summary: A very funny man if you can get past the bad language.
Title: Meet Cap

reviewText: I first saw this on Netflix, and had to buy it after they took it down. Way too funny not to own.Great sketch!
Title: Meet Cap
